name: Karen Miller
offering: Book Editing and Layout, Book Launches, Book Marketing, Book Publishing, Book Publishing Classes, Book Writing Coach
what_you_do: Open Door Publications offers writing, editing, publishing, and marketing services to help authors write, publish, and sell their books.
who_you_serve: Open Door Publications works with writers, coaches, consultants, entrepreneurs, and speakers who need help getting their book in front of the right readers.
social_proof: Open Door Publications has over 15 years of experience working with a wide variety of authors, and has helped many of their clients who are coaches, consultants, entrepreneurs, and speakers.
signature_programs: Open Door Publications offers coaching packages, virtual writer groups, and à la carte publishing services.
business_focus: Open Door Publications helps authors write, publish, and sell their books through a range of services.
service_provided: writing, coaching, virtual writer groups, editing, formatting, proofreading, cover design, publishing, marketing
